summary: This script uses Bash to copy three Python files (shallowCopy.py, getCorrectList.py, and extractLinear.py) into the specified directory, which is part of a Termux environment for analysis and decryption tasks.

details.comment: This script uses Bash to copy three Python files (shallowCopy.py, getCorrectList.py, and extractLinear.py) into the specified directory, which is part of a Termux environment for analysis and decryption tasks.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
cp shallowCopy.py /data/data/com.termux/files/home/lazer/metalearning/methodBank/analyzer/decrypter &
cp getCorrectList.py /data/data/com.termux/files/home/lazer/metalearning/methodBank/analyzer/decrypter &
cp extractLinear.py /data/data/com.termux/files/home/lazer/metalearning/methodBank/analyzer/decrypter &
